item.title: Love is in the air – A special Valentine’s Day
item.description: 14 February is Valentine’s Day. It’s celebrated around the world and in increasingly flamboyant fashion. It seems cards, flowers and candle-lit dinners are not enough for some people. And jilted lovers can also get in on the action. @DW
item.keywords: DWVC, Valentine, Valentine's Day, love, Italy, Croatia, island

item.title: Persecuted by undercover Chinese authorities in the Netherlands?
item.description: What is it like to feel persecuted by Chinese authorities even after you’ve fled the country? In the Netherlands, a young man says his life has been made a living hell by agents from a so-called Chinese overseas police station.
item.keywords: DWVC, China, Huma Rights, Netherlands, Europe, harassment

item.title: Helping Turkey's earthquake victims
item.description: Trained volunteers from Istanbul are travelling to southeeastern Turkey to join rescue efforts.
